name: Pigeon Pea Soup with Opo Squash/Bottle Gourd (Lauki Waali Toor Dal)
description: Pigeon Pea Soup with Opo Squash/Bottle Gourd (Lauki Waali Toor Dal) Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 5  curry leaves ((you can find these fresh or frozen in any Indian store. If you dont have these, substitute with one bay leaf))
1/2  Serrano chili pepper or chili flakes to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the lentils in warm water for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the lentils in warm water for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or pan, heat the oil on medium heat until hot on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or pan, heat the oil on medium heat until hot on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard(raee) seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add cumin(jeera) and nigella(Kalonji) seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard(raee) seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add cumin(jeera) and nigella(Kalonji) seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chili, turmeric, ginger and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.(1-2 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chili, turmeric, ginger and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.(1-2 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in squash and rinsed soaked daal(pigeon pea), water, salt, 1/4 teaspoon sugar(optional). You can also add in 1 medium tomato, chopped.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in squash and rinsed soaked daal(pigeon pea), water, salt, 1/4 teaspoon sugar(optional). You can also add in 1 medium tomato, chopped.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well. Cook for 2 whistles in pressure cooker(15 minutes on high pressure) or Cook covered for 30-35 minutes if in pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well. Cook for 2 whistles in pressure cooker(15 minutes on high pressure) or Cook covered for 30-35 minutes if in pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges. Serve with basmati rice or as a side with Roti, pickles, vegetable stir fry dishes and a salad of onions and cucumbers tossed in lemon juice, salt and black pepper!. Theres your complete indian meal!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges. Serve with basmati rice or as a side with Roti, pickles, vegetable stir fry dishes and a salad of onions and cucumbers tossed in lemon juice, salt and black pepper!. Theres your complete indian meal!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as soup with warm poppy dinner rolls with lime juice, olive oil, and garam masala garnish. Comfort food on a cool evening!. Have an awesome day everyone!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve as soup with warm poppy dinner rolls with lime juice, olive oil, and garam masala garnish. Comfort food on a cool evening!. Have an awesome day everyone!
